axis_supply.supply_status: Strained - Weak motorization (only 1,200 trucks vs 1,500+ for panzer divisions). Extended supply lines from Tripoli (~950 km) via coastal road. Division hastily assembled from disparate units with limited organic transport. Heavily reliant on captured British vehicles and equipment. Supply base: Tripoli with forward dumps at Derna, Tmimi, and Gazala. Water critical constraint at 10L/man/day minimum.

allied_supply.supply_status: Transitional - 90% of allotted transport and 90% of arms/equipment by end of June 1941. Division not yet considered ready for operations at start of Q3. Vehicles mostly carried over from East Africa campaign showing wear. Re-equipment ongoing through August-September. Supply situation improving as desert supply chains established from Egyptian depots.
